name: messageformat-net
description: Guidance for MessageFormat.NET (Jeffijoe.MessageFormat) ICU message formatting library. USE FOR: ICU MessageFormat pluralization, gender/select patterns, complex parameterized localization messages, locale-aware plural rules. DO NOT USE FOR: basic resource file localization (use resources-localization), culture formatting of dates/numbers (use globalization-localization), general i18n architecture (use i18n).
author: Tyler-R-Kendrick
